Group (2024-present):
POLARIX

Introduction

Xin Che is a Chinese trainee under UN24. He is a member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys.

He made his solo debut on August 30th, 2024, with the single titled “浪漫指南."
